We make plots in data science

here's the tidyverse.
```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

Here is a dataframe.
```{r}
plot_df = 
  tibble(
    x = rnorm(100, mean = 1, sd = 2),
    y = 1+2*x + rnorm(100)
  )
```


Here is the plot
```{r}
plot_df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x=x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()
```
